title: I am the greatest, apparently
author: VD
content_html:
Dr. PZ had a link to a test of personality defects. I guess the only real surprise is that I scored rather lower on Brutal than I might have expected and much higher on Rational than some of my critics would have thought.

The Braggart
85% Rational, 71% Extroverted, 28% Brutal, and 71% Arrogant.

Interesting that apparently I’m even more Arrogant than the Haughty Intellectual.

Of course, my philosophy has always been that it’s not bragging if you back up your words, and especially when you call your shot ahead of time. But your mileage may vary.
